new.dimension.item.tip1: After adding, you can get into the edit extension field
new.dimension.item.max36: Up to 36 characters, letters and numbers
new.dimension.item.tip2: Note: the dimension code will not be modified after it is saved
new.dimension.item.name: Name of dimension item
new.dimension.item.index_tip: To maintain a certain step size between the serial numbers, it is convenient for subsequent adjustment, such as the first 10, interval 10
new.dimension.item.tips3: The dimension item extension field can be edited in the dimension cost field extension field.
